content: University of Denver Health Research study NCT04567823 interim analysis shows aquatic therapy reduces opioid use by 41% among participants with lumbar degenerative disc disease. The 2022-2024 study at Maplewood tracks outcomes for 78 enrollees using wearable mobility sensors. Preliminary data suggests greatest benefits for patients combining 2x weekly pool sessions with monthly nerve blocks. IRB approval extends through December 2024.
